summary: The diff summary shows modifications only to metadata/summary files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`). There is no evidence that the required favicon PNG assets were added/overwritten under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, no evidence that `frontend/index.html` was updated/verified for correct favicon links, and no evidence that `frontend/public/favicon.ico` was replaced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a complete favicon PNG asset set from `Heart.png` at the exact sizes/filenames referenced by `frontend/index.html` and add/overwrite them under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows no added/modified PNG files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and no evidence of favicon image generation/output files being created or overwritten.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0 (no new assets); only modified files are `frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link>` tags match the generated assets under `/assets/generated/` (update `frontend/index.html` if needed).
missing_requirements.reason: There is no evidence `frontend/index.html` was modified or validated; it does not appear in the modified files list.
evidence: File diff summary modified files list does not include `frontend/index.html`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace `frontend/public/favicon.ico` with an `.ico` generated from the same `Heart.png` source.
missing_requirements.reason: There is no evidence `frontend/public/favicon.ico` was modified/replaced; it does not appear in the modified files list.
evidence: File diff summary modified files list does not include `frontend/public/favicon.ico`.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state to describe favicon regeneration work (and reference unrelated prior feature reqIds like REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3/REQ-6/REQ-13/REQ-15) without corresponding evidence of the actual favicon asset and `index.html` changes being implemented.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks for generating favicon assets and ensuring `frontend/index.html` references resolve; modifying `project_state.json` is not requested and does not demonstrate implementation of the required asset changes.
evidence: project_state.json (modified): summary mentions updating `frontend/index.html` and replacing favicon assets, but no such files appear in the diff modified/added lists.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` to include/describe numerous frontend component/backend changes unrelated to favicon asset wiring.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly prohibit changes to application features/UI/backend beyond favicon wiring. The only concrete evidence in the diff is that this summary file was changed to describe many unrelated areas.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified): contains descriptions of many app components/hooks and even `backend/main.mo` that are unrelated to favicon generation/wiring.
